entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.3Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
